name: DevOps & Cloud Computing
description: Master containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure management.

captain.name: Nirajan Devkota
captain.bio: Software Engineering student | A motivated software engineering student focused in developing efficient and reliable software solutions
captain.message: Let's automate and scale together. Reach out for DevOps and cloud collaborations!

longDescription: The DevOps & Cloud Computing sub-community focuses on modern infrastructure practices, automation, and cloud-native technologies. We explore Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, AWS, Azure, and other cloud platforms to build scalable and reliable systems.
vision: Empowering students with cloud and DevOps skills to build the next generation of scalable applications.
